refnamediv.refpurpose: Calculates the discrete Fourier transform of a matrix using Fast Fourier Transform algorithm.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: fft (x, n, dim) fft (x, n) fft (x)

listitem.para: Specifies the number of elements of x to be used
Specifies the dimention of the matrix along which the FFT is performed

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This is an Octave function. The FFT is calculated along the first non-singleton dimension of the array. Thus, FFT is computed for each column of x.

n is an integer specifying the number of elements of x to use. If n is larger than dimention along. which the FFT is calculated, then x is resized and padded with zeros. Similarly, if n is smaller, then x is truncated.
dim is an integer specifying the dimension of the matrix along which the FFT is performed.
